title: get_supply_summary
description: Verify that the GET /api/economy/supply endpoint returns the correct supply summary with status 200.

title: list_supply_transactions_with_limit
description: Test the GET /api/economy/supply/txs endpoint with a limit query parameter to ensure it returns a paginated list of supply transactions.

title: supply_sse_stream_connection
description: Validate that the GET /api/economy/supply/stream endpoint establishes a Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream and sends supply updates correctly.

title: list_users_with_fires_pagination_and_search
description: Test the GET /api/economy/users endpoint with cursor, limit, and search query parameters to verify correct pagination and filtering of users with fires.

title: get_user_fires_history_with_pagination
description: Verify the GET /api/economy/history/{userId} endpoint returns the correct fires transaction history for a user with support for limit and offset pagination.

title: list_sponsors
description: Test the GET /api/economy/sponsors endpoint to ensure it returns the list of sponsors with status 200.

title: add_sponsor_with_valid_data
description: Verify that the POST /api/economy/sponsors/add endpoint allows an admin to add a sponsor with valid userId, key, description, and initialAmount, returning status 200.

title: remove_sponsor_by_userid
description: Test the POST /api/economy/sponsors/remove endpoint to remove a sponsor by userId and verify the response status is 200.

title: transfer_fires_between_users_with_sponsor_key
description: Validate the POST /api/economy/transfer endpoint to transfer fires from one user to another with required fields and optional sponsorKey, ensuring the transfer is successful.

title: redeem_item_from_store
description: Test the POST /api/store/redeem endpoint to redeem an item from the store using userId and itemId, verifying the response status is 200 and the item is correctly redeemed.
